mapper.select: select ROUND(avg(positionScore)) avgPositionScore, ROUND(avg(facilitiesScore)) avgFacilitiesScore,ROUND(avg(serviceScore)) avgServiceScore,ROUND(avg(hygieneScore)) avgHygieneScore,ROUND(avg(score)) avgScore from itrip_comment;
SELECT * FROM itrip_image WHERE type=2 AND targetId=#{targetId}
mapper.insert: insert into itrip_image (type, targetId, position, imgUrl) value (#{type},#{targetId},#{position},#{imgUrl})

insert into itrip_comment( hotelId, productId, orderId, productType, content, userId, isHavingImg, positionScore, facilitiesScore, serviceScore, hygieneScore, score, tripMode, isOk ) values( #{hotelId}, #{productId}, #{orderId}, #{productType}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{isHavingImg}, #{positionScore}, #{facilitiesScore}, #{serviceScore}, #{hygieneScore}, #{score}, #{tripMode}, #{isOk} )
